product_description: A durable electrical junction box used to house wiring connections safely in residential and commercial settings. Made from high-quality plastic, it prevents accidental electrical shocks and keeps wiring neat.
A standard 15-amp duplex outlet suitable for household use, compatible with two-prong and three-prong plugs. UL-listed for safety and made from fire-resistant material.
A single pole light switch for controlling lights from one location. Easy to install and compatible with most residential lighting systems. Made of durable thermoplastic material.
An adjustable dimmer switch allowing control over light intensity. Compatible with incandescent and dimmable LED bulbs. Adds ambiance to any room with smooth control and easy installation.
Ground Fault Circuit Interrupter (GFCI) outlet designed to cut off power in case of an electrical fault, ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Ensures safety near water-prone areas.
A weatherproof cover designed to protect outdoor outlets from moisture and debris. Made from high-impact, UV-resistant plastic for durability and safety.
A three-way switch for controlling lights from multiple locations. Suitable for hallways, staircases, and large rooms. Compatible with most standard light fixtures.
Flexible electrical conduit for routing wires in tight spaces. Made from flame-retardant PVC material, suitable for residential and light commercial wiring.
A metallic electrical box for use in walls or ceilings. Sturdy construction, ideal for wiring projects in commercial and residential settings. UL-listed for safety.
Versatile cable ties for organizing and securing wires. Made from high-quality nylon, with a tensile strength suitable for household and industrial uses.
Twist-on wire connectors for joining wires securely. Color-coded for easy identification and designed to handle different wire sizes for a safe connection.
Black vinyl electrical tape for insulating and protecting electrical connections. Resistant to UV, moisture, and chemicals, suitable for indoor and outdoor use.
Standard circuit breaker for residential electrical panels, designed to trip when an overload or short circuit occurs, ensuring safety.
Plastic cable clips with nails, designed to hold wires in place along walls or ceilings. Ideal for organizing cables in a safe, tidy manner.
A heavy-duty, weather-resistant extension cord designed for outdoor use. Available in various lengths, suitable for powering tools and outdoor lighting.
A non-contact voltage tester for checking live circuits without touching wires. Essential for safety in wiring projects, it alerts the user to live wires.
Quick-connect push-in wire connectors for easy and secure connections. Commonly used in electrical boxes for reliable wire terminations.
Plastic-insulated staples for securing cables to wooden surfaces. Compatible with various wire types, ideal for keeping cables organized.
A multi-outlet surge protector with a built-in circuit breaker. Safeguards electronics from power surges and spikes, ideal for home and office use.
Programmable outdoor light timer, perfect for automating outdoor lighting schedules. Weather-resistant and easy to set, enhances security and saves energy.
